solution_line_template: By adding Friday and Saturday, Alexandra bought {magazines_saturday}+{magazines_friday}=<<{magazines_saturday}+{magazines_friday}={magazines_friday_saturday}>>{magazines_friday_saturday} magazines

Before her dog got to them she had {magazines_saturday}+{magazines_friday}+{magazines_sunday}=<<{magazines_saturday}+{magazines_friday}+{magazines_sunday}={total_before_dog}>>{total_before_dog} magazines
After her dog chewed up some she had {total_before_dog}-{chewed_magazines}=<<{total_before_dog}-{chewed_magazines}={final_magazines}>>{final_magazines} magazines
